file.name: user.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Adzerk Management API - User Management
  description: Manage access to Kevel, create new Kevel users, or update the names or emails of Kevel users in your account
  version: '1.0'
servers:
  - url: 'https://api.adzerk.net'
tags:
  - name: user
    description: User Management
paths:
  /v1/login:
    get:
      tags:
        - user
      operationId: list
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: pageSize
          in: query
          description: The size of the page to be returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            nullable: true
            default: 500
        - name: page
          in: query
          description: The page number to be returned
          required: false
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
            nullable: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: A paged list of Scheduled Reports
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/user.yaml#/schemas/UserList'
    post:
      tags:
        - user
      operationId: create
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - Email
              properties:
                Email:
                  type: string
                Password:
                  type: string
                Name:
                  type: string
                  nullable: true
                AccessLevel:
                  $ref: './schemas/user.yaml#/schemas/AccessLevel'
                  nullable: true
                DefaultTimeZone:
                  type: string
                  nullable: true
                CanAccessStudio:
                  type: boolean
      responses:
        200:
          description: The user
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/user.yaml#/schemas/User'
  '/v1/login/{id}':
    parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: Id of the User to update
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
    put:
      tags:
        - user
      operationId: update
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - id
                - Email
                - Name
              properties:
                id:
                  type: integer
                  format: int32
                Email:
                  type: string
                Name:
                  type: string
                AccessLevel:
                  $ref: './schemas/user.yaml#/schemas/AccessLevel'
                  nullable: true
                DefaultTimeZone:
                  type: string
                  nullable: true
                CanAccessStudio:
                  type: boolean
      responses:
        200:
          description: Updated User
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/user.yaml#/schemas/User'
    get:
      tags:
        - user
      operationId: get
      security:
        - ApiKeyAuth: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: The User
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './schemas/user.yaml#/schemas/User'
components:
  securitySchemes:
    $ref: './components/security-schemes.yaml#/components/securitySchemes'

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 141: cannot unmarshal !!str `./compo...` into ogen.SecurityScheme
